Author: fishonthesun
Text: Someone else said electrolytes, I second that. Getting a powerade zero could help, especially since it is flavored. I hope you can get hydrated. Also, it sounds like you're in a potentially dangerous situation here. If you drink the powerade and dont feel any better, you should reach out to someone and let them know what's going on. Or even lie and say you've had the flu and are super dehydrated and need to go to the hospital   I hope you feel better soon
